div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1605 Haifa (anc. Sicmona), Phoenicia, 1969 Burial: after 112 B . C . (Spaer) Contents: 24 AR. Washed up by sea Antiochus VIII: 20 tetradr. (Antiocheia 9; Ace 3, 2 Phoenician and 1 Attic weight; Damascus 7; Sidon 1, Attic weight) Antiochus IX: 4 tetradr. (Sidon, Attic weight) Disposition: Haifa Information from A. Spaer. Latest yr. 197 = 116/5 B.C.
